Html:
Hey everyone, Hope everything is just going perfect

when i was trying to run the example code i downloaded from examples this error appeared and i dont know what to do

any help please

Unable to load DLL 'wlanapi.dll': The specified module could not be found. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x8007007E)

i solved this problem as windows xp sp2 doesnt support wlanapi.dll

but i want to ask another question about this error

the service can't be started

i got an error says network profile is corrupted as a keytype is wrong but i have the same in the network profile xml file

 

i put it on a file and readed it it made everything is alright

 

but when i try to put it on string i got this error above

 

hey any help from anyone unless me
